oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The CBC COED, 1970-71
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Women; Students; Education; Universities & colleges
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
It was announced that Christian Brothers College would go coed in September 1970 in February of that year.
Thirty women were admitted the first year, and they were housed on the top floor of Maurelian Hall.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Brother Michael Murphy, art work; Edwina Carruth, Dean of Women; Sister Florence Weinel, Assistant Dean of Women
